pr_title: xds: update LRS protocol and fix usage of cluster name in ClusterStats

timeline.message: Add cluster name field in EDS LB config. Temporarily make it optional (it should be required).
Let XdsClient return an CdsUpdate that contains exactly what an CDS response contains. That is, if edsServiceName field is unset, leave it null.
Change LoadReportClient for correct implementation of LRS protocol.
